en-US.title: efflux
en-US.warningSongReset: Are you sure you want to close your current project and start a new one ? You will lose all unsaved changes and undo history.
en-US.recordOutputExpl: You can record your song as a .WAV file and download it onto your device. Recording takes place during playback and will stop automatically once the end of the song is reached. Enjoy your listen or grab a drink while waiting.
en-US.songExported: Song '{song}' exported to your download folder
en-US.instrumentsExported: Instrument presets exported to your download folder
